code: export function validateEmail(email){var re=/^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());}export function checkName(input){var name=/^[A-Za-z]\w$/;if(input.match(name)){return true;}return false;}
